entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
